decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
230100-PL-D 0002 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plan);

230100-PL-D 0003 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed First Floor Plan); 230100-PL-D 0004 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plan); 230100-PL-D 0005 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plan); 230100-PL-D 0006 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Sections);  230100-PL-D 0007 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Sections);  230100-PL-D 0008 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Elevation); 230100-PL-D 0009 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Elevation); 230100-PL-D 0001 Rev:01 (Existing and Proposed Block Plan); Site Location Plan
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Conversion of garage into habitable room involving replacing garage door with window; installation of roof canopy to front elevation; installation of glass canopy to rear elevation,  replacement of sliding doors with window and door to rear elevation; installation of two rooflights to flat roof
